Text: I read some of the reviews and was on the fence about ordering these - I am very glad I did!  I've been having issues with my standard "Donut Shop" K-cups not waking me up.  After one cup of Fog Chaser, I was wide awake.  The stuff tastes good too. My wife, who drinks less coffee than me described it as "Good Diner Coffee".  The only thing is I recommend storing them in Zip Lock bags (like other people have suggested).
